content.rendered:
Below is a comprehensive list of fees for accelerated undergraduates students. Note: Not all may apply.

Tuition

Tuition, per semester hour $665
Tuition (Active duty military rate), per semester hour $250

Fees

Appeal Fee $50
Application Fee (non-refundable) $50
Auditing, per semester hour 1/2 per unit
Community Service Fee $50
Course Challenge Fee, per course one semester hour of tuition
Deferred Payment Plan Fee, per semester $75
Deferred Payment Plan Fee, summer $50
Graduation Fee $140
Health Insurance  (optional, mandatory for international students, unless waiver is submitted and approved), per semester $602
Health Insurance  (mandatory for new international students, unless waiver is submitted and approved), for summer $301
Late Financial Arrangement $100-300
Missed Payment Fee $35
Registration Fee, per course $30
Lost (Replacement) ID card $5
Returned Check Fee $25
Transcript, per copy $12
Transcript sent Certified Mail, per copy $15
Transcript (24-hour turnaround), per copy $20
Transcript (special mailing/handling request), per copy $35
